Summary: UFO buzzed overhead while sitting on porch smoking cigarette
divs: sighting detailsi went outside for a cigarette before retiring for the night. while sitting there this object came from behind me (n.w.) just over our apartment\house and continued on a southeast direction. the moment i seen this object i grabbed my camera, a kodak m530 easyshare 12 mp. and took photos of this object until i could no longer capture images on the camera. i still watched the object until i could no longer see it with my eyes. in the first photo, i do not know what the bright object is on the right side.
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There were no other sightings in La Porte on or around July 29th 2012
